item.title: Belgium rejects EU plan to use frozen Russian assets for Ukraine
item.description: Belgium on Wednesday rejected a plan to use frozen Russian assets to help prop up Ukraine's economy and war effort over the next two years, saying that the scheme poses financial and legal risks.

item.title: The use and misuse of the word 'ideology'
item.description: The word "ideology" has become a fixture in American political rhetoric, invoked by leaders to cast opponents' beliefs as dangerous, stupid or unfounded. But it wasn't always this way.
